T03D3804:239b-47: rab gnas mtshon nas dpag med bshad //
T03D3804:239b-48: gdul bya'i ngor ni 'di tsam gyis //
T03D3804:240a-2: mtshan gyi mtshan nyid dag tu bshad //
T03D3804:240a-3: ngo bo spyir ni gzugs yin yang //
T03D3804:240a-4: phal dud dbang po lnga la 'jog / sems kyi rnam dag mtshon pas na //
T03D3804:240a-5: dpe byad zer te yang na ni //
T03D3804:240a-6: mtshan ni brgyan par byed pas na //
T03D3804:240a-7: dpe byad du yang 'dod pa yod //
T03D3804:240a-8: sangs rgyas mtshan nyid ma yin yang //
T03D3804:240a-9: ji ltar 'dul bar sprul pas na //
T03D3804:240a-10: gzugs sku zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T03D3804:240a-11: nges pa bzhi dang bral nas su //
T03D3804:240a-12: ji lta ba dang ji lta bur //
T03D3804:240a-13: de lta ba dang de lta bur //
T03D3804:240a-14: ston pa sprul pa'i sku yin no //
T03D3804:240a-15: de yi mdzad pa nyi shu bdun //
T03D3804:240a-16: lhun gyis grub cing rgyun mi 'chad //
T03D3804:240a-18: sangs rgyas la 'god rnam grol gsung //
T03D3804:240a-19: yang na ji lta ji snyed pa //
T03D3804:240a-20: ji snyed rten dang lam bzhi 'god //
T03D3804:240a-21: mthar thug la dgod ji lta ba //
T03D3804:240a-22: buddha shr'i dzny'a na zer ro //
T03D3804:240a-23: de ltar mdzad pa dpag med kyang //
T03D3804:240a-24: lam bden rang bzhin gnas skabs te //
T03D3804:240a-26: lhun grub rgyun mi 'chad pa yang //
T03D3804:240a-27: thub pa kho na'i mdzad par bzhed //
T03D3804:240a-28: bhangga lar skyes dge slong ni //
T03D3804:240a-29: mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis //
T03D3804:240a-30: gzhung dang bla ma'i gsung gis ni //
T03D3804:240a-31: phar phyin bsdus don sgron mar byas //
T03D3804:240a-32: de dag dri med gang thob pas //
T03D3804:240a-33: 'gro kun log rtog rnam spangs te //
T03D3804:240a-34: pha rol phyin nyid rtogs nas kyang //
T03D3804:240a-35: gzhan la phan phyir ston par shog / shes rab
T03D3804:240a-36: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsdus don sgron ma
T03D3804:240a-37: zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis
T03D3804:240a-40: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba mkhas
T03D3804:240a-41: pa chen po'i chen po tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur
